data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        ContextButton,
        Popover,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Popover
    logic_id="popover-hidden"
    alignment_x="right"
    hidden="mobile"
    spacing="medium"
    dismissible
>
    <ContextButton
        palette="accent"
        hidden={["tablet", "desktop", "widescreen"]}
    >
        Open HIDDEN Popover
    </ContextButton>

    <Box
        palette="inverse"
        max_width="content-max"
        padding="medium"
    >
        This was HIDDEN on MOBILE only.
    </Box>
</Popover>
data.title: Popover Hidden
